content: लघिमन् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} [लघोर्भावः इमनिच् डिच्च] {@--1@} Lightness, absence of weight. {@--2@} Littleness, smallness, insignificance. {@--3@} Lightness, levity, lowness or meanness of spirit; मानुषतासुलभो लघिमा प्रश्नकर्मणि मां नियोजयति <ls>K.</ls> {@--4@} Thoughtlessness, frivolity. {@--5@} The supernatural power of assuming excessive lightness at will, one of the eight {%Siddhis%} <ab>q. v.</ab>
